abstract: Arik Air, Lagos, Nigeria, named C. Moore Media International Public Relations, New York, as its public relations agency of record.
snippet: Arik Air, Lagos, Nigeria, named C. Moore Media International Public Relations, New York, as its public relations agency of record.
lead_paragraph: Arik Air, Lagos, Nigeria, named C. Moore Media International Public Relations, New York, as its public relations agency of record. The airline had previously worked with the agency on a project basis. Billings were not disclosed.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
